data.title: Near-Palindromes
data.statement: A near-palindrome is a word one letter away from being a palindrome, be it by replacement, addition or removal.

data.constraints:
[[N]] < 1000
word length < 10000

Words are solely lowercase alphabetic ASCII characters.
This puzzle Really Has Nothing To Do with the Hypersonic challenge.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read word:string(10000)
write 0
data.inputDescription:
Line {{1}}: the number of words [[N]]
Next [[N]] lines: a word
data.outputDescription:
A single line of zeroes and ones.
For each word in the input, in order, output {{1}} if the word is a near-palindrome and {{0}} otherwise.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A near-palindrome is a word one letter away from being a palindrome, be it by replacement, addition or removal.
Input
Line 1: the number of words N
Next N lines: a word
Output
A single line of zeroes and ones.
For each word in the input, in order, output 1 if the word is a near-palindrome and 0 otherwise.
Constraints
N < 1000
word length < 10000

Words are solely lowercase alphabetic ASCII characters.
This puzzle Really Has Nothing To Do with the Hypersonic challenge.
Example
Input
2
ricecar
racecars
Output
11
